author: The Hairy Bikers
method: To make the salsa, combine all the ingredients together in a bowl and serve immediately.
ingredients: 250g/9oz fresh tomatoes, finely chopped,  1 small onion, finely chopped,  3 mild chillies, finely chopped,  bunch coriander, finely chopped,  salt, to taste,  lime juice, to taste,  1 tbsp water
